attributes.action: reconsider his decision not to join the Generalissimos when he resigns as Prime Minister.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Prime Minister has declined the generous invitation of the Generalissimos that he become their new rhythm guitarist. While this is an unwarranted snub to the Generalissimos it is also a misguided decision, which may impede his desire to return to serious music.
